    port0_wr_addr or
    port0_wr_data or
    port1_wr_en or
    port1_wr_mask or
    port1_wr_addr or
    port1_wr_data or
    port2_wr_en or
    port2_wr_mask or
    port2_wr_addr or
    port2_wr_data or
    port3_wr_en or
    port3_wr_mask or
    port3_wr_addr or
    port3_wr_data or
    port4_wr_en or
    port4_wr_mask or
    port4_wr_addr or
    port4_wr_data or
    port5_wr_en or
    port5_wr_mask or
    port5_wr_addr or
    port5_wr_data or
    port6_wr_en or
    port6_wr_mask or
    port6_wr_addr or
    port6_wr_data or
    port7_wr_en or
    port7_wr_mask or
    port7_wr_addr or
    port7_wr_data or
    port8_wr_en or
    port8_wr_mask or
    port8_wr_addr or
